member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Agent#SalesOrderAgent#SO Agent.OnGetEmailProcessLimitPer24Hours(Integer@)
member.param: Limit of the number of emails that can be processed in 24 hours

member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Agent#SalesOrderAgent#SOA Impl.ActiveAgentExistInCurrentCompany:Boolean
member.summary: Checks if the agent is active in the current company. Method must work even for users that have no access to Agent, thus we need to use User table to check if the agent is enabled.
member.returns: True if active agent exists, false otherwise.

member.name: O:Codeunit::Microsoft#Agent#SalesOrderAgent#SOA Test Setup
member.summary: Methods for testing the agent setup upon activation.

member.name: O:Codeunit::Microsoft#Agent#SalesOrderAgent#SOA Session Filter
member.summary: This codeunit is used to filter the documents based on the contact that sent the email.
